## Report Overview
This report summarises sample sizes for a cluster randomized controlled trial using a range of assumptions as detailed below.

The sample size and cluster numbers presented are for a two-arm trial.

Contact Alexander.Perkins@LSHTM.ac.uk for questions or comments.

```{r, echo = FALSE}
# Summary of conditions used
cat("Calculation Type: ", params$calculation_type, "\n\n")
cat("User Entered Variables:\n")
for (condition in names(params$conditions)) {
  cat(condition, ":", params$conditions[[condition]], "\n")
}

# Sample Size Table
cat("\nSample Size Table:\n")
print(params$sample_size_table)

# Cluster Table
cat("\nCluster Table:\n")
print(params$cluster_table)
```
